citation: Proclamation under the Commercial Arbitration Act 2011 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Commercial Arbitration Act 2011

I, the Administrator in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 1B of the Commercial Arbitration Act 2011 fix 1 October 2012 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

17 September 2012

P. E. EVANS

Administrator

By His Excellency's Command,

BRIAN WIGHTMAN

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 September 2012

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
